titles.title: Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
To extend the authorization of appropriations to the Department of Veterans Affairs for purposes of awarding grants to veterans service organizations for the transportation of highly rural veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
This bill amends the Caregivers and Veterans Omnibus Health Services Act of 2010 to reauthorize through FY2018 a grant program to provide innovative transportation options to veterans in highly rural areas.
